name: QLIX ISSUE 03/Collage
description:
ISSUE 03/Collage is finally here and is waiting for your kind purchase at $5 (+ $3/shipping).  However, once you receive a copy of your "limited limited" edition of ISSUE 03, be prepared to experience a visual enjoyment like no other (plus the glow in the dark logo or "too sweet for words" Qlix girl buttons are a definite pleaser)!  Some of the features inside  ISSUE 03 include: our take on the early 1900s art form of an 'exquisite corpse' created by a talented trio of illustrators from around the world (P.Caravello/Finland, J. O'Brien/UK, and S. Rabin/NYC); London's Young Fashion Photographer of  2010 (crowned by Clothes Show Live), Amberly Valentine , gave us her interpretation of "collage" thru a stylishly "Smashing Pumpkin-esque" fashion story titled -- Imaginarium; and take a peek inside the collaged world of  Peter Clarke's paper stylings. 

Limited Limited edition...once they are gone..they are GONE!

name: Qlix Magazine ISSUE 02
description:
QLIX ISSUE 02 - FANTASY 

EMERGING. FASHION. FOUND.

What's inside: exclusive interviews with Rag & Bone designers -- Marcus Wainwright and David Neville; Because magazine editor -- Caroline Issa; RENGILL designer -- Lauren Gill; a look into the 7 wonders of the fashion world to emerging tee labels you should know about, but probably don't, and more....
